Joe

helpful to get a sense of your schedules, for planning purposes. 
Thanks,

Thank you for reaching out, and we would be happy to schedule a time to speak with you. I expect 
our schedules may be somewhat unpredictable tomorrow; would it work to set a time to talk on 
Tuesday? We can schedule it for before you meet with , if that's helpful. Or if you'd like to

discussion. Please let us know what you prefer, and we look forward to being in touch. 
thank you,

My former partner, Alan Ross, re resente prior to his passing 
in 2018. Agent served with a grand jury subpoena earlier today, and as Alan's 
former partner and FL Bar appointed inventory attorney, she has contacted me. Unfortunately, I am 
unable to meet with her until Tuesday, but I would appreciate a few minutes of your time at your

Look forward to speaking with you.
